name: DEEP BLUEDOT, INC.
description: Developer of a customer feedback analysis platform intended to boost productivity by automating and streamlining the issue-reporting process. The company's platform helps in reporting bugs and usability feedback directly from the screen and also issues reporting resulting in a fast QA process, enabling clients to minimize their issue reporting process and spend time creating revenue.
one_liner: Developer of a customer feedback analysis platform intended to boost productivity by automating and streamlining the issue-reporting process. The company's platform helps in reporting bugs and usability feedback directly from the screen and also issues reporting resulting in a fast QA process, enabling clients to minimize their issue reporting process and spend time creating revenue.
